caption.p: SCM4OPT model structure. The abbreviations shown in this figure are as follows. AeroDir direct forcing effects from aerosols, cloudc cloud cover, EMS emissions, FF fossil fuels, GDP gross domestic product, LUC land-use change, max maximize, MHalo halogenated gases regulated under the Montreal Protocol, mindust mineral dust, OZs stratospheric ozone, OZt tropospheric ozone, RF radiative forcing, volc volcanic
